com.jacobschneider.engine.physics

Class Body

  • Object
    • Body
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Body
extends Object
implements Drawable
    Holds information about a single body. This includes the material, the shape, the bounding volume, and the physics. Also contains a Drawable mixin that is called by BasicUniverse. Can be created by a Body.Builder or through one of the static factory methods in Bodies.
    Author:
    Jacob

    • Nested Class Summary

      Builder pattern for the Body class

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float deltaTime)
        Updates the Body by one physics frame.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time elapsed since last physics frame.

      • draw

        public void draw(GLAutoDrawable drawable)
        Draws the Body graphically in the window.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Drawable
        Parameters:
        drawable - JOGL drawable object to draw to

      • addInputs

        public void addInputs(Vector3 force,
                      Vector3 torque)
        Inputs additional forces and torques onto the body. These inputs remain on the body for the duration of objects existence.
        Parameters:
        force - force being exerted on the object
        torque - torque being exerted on the object

      • thrustInputs

        public void thrustInputs(Vector3 force,
                         Vector3 torque,
                         float duration)
        Inputs a temporary force/torque on a body for a certain duration of time.
        Parameters:
        force - force being exerted on the body
        torque - torque being exerted on the object
        duration - the amount of time the force and torque are held for

      • getX

        public Vector3 getX()
        The position of this body in 3D space.
        Returns:
        position of the body

      • addAccel

        public void addAccel(Vector3 accel)
        Adds a permanent acceleration to the center of mass of this body. This remains affecting the body for the duration of the simulation
        Parameters:
        accel - Acceleration to add to this body

      • collisionDetect

        public List<Collision.Contact> collisionDetect(Body other)
        Determines all points of contact between this body and another body
        Parameters:
        other - The other Body object
        Returns:
        a list of Collision.Contact objects

      • isFixed

        public boolean isFixed()
        Determines if a body is fixed
        Returns:
        Whether this body is fixed
